events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position outlining their experience in backend development.
The applicant's profile has been categorized under the engineering cluster based on keywords such as developer and software expertise.
A recruiter from the engineering hiring team has been assigned to manage the candidate's recruitment process.
The recruiter completed an initial screening call where the candidate demonstrated strong knowledge in software development methodologies.
The candidate responded promptly confirming their availability for a technical interview next week.
A technical interview with the engineering team has been scheduled for the candidate on May 10th at 3 PM UTC.
The candidate successfully completed the technical interview demonstrating strong coding skills and problem-solving abilities.
Following a positive technical round, an HR interview has been scheduled for May 13th to discuss cultural fit and benefits.
The candidate completed the HR interview and expressed enthusiasm about the company's values and team environment.
A formal job offer has been proposed to the candidate including details about compensation, benefits, and start date.
The candidate provided positive feedback about the offer and expressed strong interest in joining the engineering team.
The candidate formally accepted the offer and confirmed their start date as June 1st.
The candidate has started the onboarding process and is completing initial training sessions for their engineering role.
The hiring process for the software engineer position is now closed with the successful onboarding of the new hire.
